column3: > Seems reasonable, although the use case for this is not immediately obvious to me.\n\nThe use case is for applications that are using RBF for something else than bumping fee (as implemented by `bumpfee` RPC). RBF requires new inputs added to a replacement to be confirmed. The functional tests are modeled after one of the use cases: increasing the value of an output beyond the current funding o
